entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet workload uninstall` does not support verbosity flag #31684
  • Error NETSDK1004 occurs when building any C++/CLI project. #31683

Closed

  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools does not install on Linux #31685
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][Regression] Publishing blazorwasm project failed with error MSB3073: The command "embuilder.bat build MINIMAL" exited with code 1. #31330
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression] Publishing blazorwasm project is blocked by"Emscripten Deadlocked" warning. #31209

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.0 to 19.12.1 in /eng/dependabot #31682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.0 to 19.12.1 in /eng/dependabot #31681
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31674
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools

Updated

  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Register off-by-default analyzer: configuration binding generator #31654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • Bundle Source Link packages #31632
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 9500 dotnet tool install: Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade when specify version #31549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add implementation and test for add Trademark assembly attribute #31611
    untriaged, Area-Tools
